name: Gramma's House
description:
This game was made for The Linux Game Jam in 2 days but I was way too late to submit

A short atmospheric horror game, where you play as a kid. Hope you like it!

Story: 

You are Justin and your parents always kept you in the dark about your grandparents.You only know that your Grandma is an exorcist and your Grandpa is deaf and hates you but they are very rich.Yesterday you've received a letter from your grandma telling you to come, she has something for you, without informing your parents and leaving your phone at home you left.When you reached the door was open and after entering you don't remember anything while you're locked inside with a psychopath.Can you escape unharmed?

Controls:

use WASD/Arrow keys to move

use Mouse to look

use `E` to interact with stuff

Mechanics/How to beat the game:

Go near doors and if an red icons shows up press e to open.Items can be picked up similarly, go near them and if you see the red icon press E and if you need something to interact with it a red pop up will show up saying what you need.There's is the main door on the ground floor with padlock,digital lock and wooden boards.Once you open the door you've escaped.If the killer comes near you it will kill you and game over! Don't worry he can't hear you but can see you!

Please report any bugs you find down below in the comment/discussion section.
